resources: Questionnaire App True FALSE The study of plants is known as botany//True There are less than 100 bones in the human body//False-206 Kelvin is a measure of Temparature//True Human body has four lungs//False-2 Albert Einstein was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics //True Spider has 6 legs//False-8 Water is an example of a chemical element//False Sharks are Mammals//False-fish Electrons are larger than molecules//False Venus is the closest planet to the sun//False-Mercury The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on Earth //False-Pacific Ocean That\'s Correct That\'s Incorrect previous next
